text:
"Hulk" is a 2003 American superhero movie directed by Ang Lee. It was based on the Marvel character Hulk by Stan Lee. "Hulk's" main actors are Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, and Nick Nolte.
Plot.
In the 1960s, David Banner wanted to create super soldiers but General Ross denied him permission. David decided to test on himself. He later had a son named Bruce.
